testsuite.name: Scenario: creation is successful with valid username and password

testcase.name: Given command new user is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation is successful with valid username and password

testcase.name: When username "pekka" and password "akkep!123" are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation is successful with valid username and password
